St. Ignatius Summer Recovery School is starting on August 3rd!

All K-5 grade level students (2020-2021 school year) are invited to attend. The program will run August 3 through August 13, Mon. - Thurs. You can choose either the AM or the PM session. AM is from 8-11 and PM is from 12-3. Students will eat a snack at 11 for the AM session and at 12 for the PM session.

Students will review and strengthen their math and reading skills with certified teachers and staff of St. Ignatius Schools, they will enjoy social time and play with peers (with appropriate social distancing and masks), and will have a snack either at the end of their session (AM) or at the beginning of their session (PM)

Come and join the fun and keep your brain sharp. Get prepared for the new school year and practice new protocols for staying healthy and safe during Covid-19 and let's have some fun together before the summer is over!

You can register your child clicking on the link below https://forms.gle/yRVPK5vFneQjorSq7

or
